members.description: Constructor. All Flex components are subclasses of the UIComponent class. relative to the relativeTo component. Must be one of the following: "firstChild", "lastChild", "before" or "after".

values: relativeTo The component relative to which child is added.
position the location in the display list of the target

members.description: The position of the child in the display list, relative to the object specified by the relativeTo property. Valid values are "before", "after", "firstChild", and "lastChild".
